trans-unit.source: A static extension methods class for getting a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> instance from an <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Classe di metodi di estensione statici per ottenere un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> da un'istanza <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> from which to create the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> instance.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> instance from an <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> da un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance can be read, written and copied just as a traditional <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> istanza può essere letto, scritta e copiata come tradizionale <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance can also "read" to retrieve the original <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage> instance by calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> istanza può anche "leggere" per recuperare originale <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage> istanza chiamando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A> metodo di estensione.
